__TOC__

WARNING: WIP !

Xubuntu needs about 40 xfce4 related source packages currently in universe. They are all maintained by debian upstream (except exo, but we'll sync the debian exo package soon), conform to packaging standards and have not had security issues in the past (I only found a reference to an xfce3 bug but that was another codebase years ago). The list of the packages, with libraries first.

These reflect the current status as of xfce 4.2. Starting with xfce4.{3,4} which should soon land in sid and then in 
ubuntu some packages may be renamed and some may go away altogether (those marked with *), in case this influences
the process of promoting them to main.
